item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "One is fruitful only at the cost of being rich in contradictions." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Freedom is the will to be responsible for ourselves." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "if we possess a why of life we can put up with almost any how." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Do you want to go along with others? or go on ahead? or go off on your own?...you must know <i>what </i> you want and <i>that</i> you want. Fourth question for the conscience." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Are you one who looks on? or lends a hand? - or who looks away, sidles off?...Third question for the conscience." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I mistrust all systematizers and avoid them. the will to a system is a lack of integrity." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: steven add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "We no longer have a sufficiently high estimate of ourselves when we communicate. Our true experiences are not garrulous. They could not communicate themselves if they wanted to: they lack words. We have already grown beyond whatever we have words for. In all talking there lies a grain of contempt. Speech, it seems, was devised only for the average medium, communicable. The speaker has already vulgarized himself by speaking." -- Friedrich Nietzsche
